topic.topicDialog: The Test Yourself activities do not appear in the student's Library as they are automatically marked by Kerboodle and can be used for Test and Assessment purposes.

step.stepTextTip: Once logged into Kerboodle, access the course from which you'd like to assign the Test Yourself.
Use the action drop-down arrow next to the Test Yourself title and select Assign this test to your Teaching Groups.

In the pop up window, give the Test a Name and Description.

Tick the box next to the Teaching Group, or expand the list of Students and tick individual names to allocate the Test to them.
Choose a Start Date and End Date for the Test and once completed, click OK.
Your test will then appear in your Assignments panel on the Course page.
